title: In the Realm of the Senses
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy Now Radio Show #12
itunes:author: Philosophy Now
description: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now visits the realm of the senses with guests Barry Smith, Director of the Institute of Philosophy, Norman Bacrac, an epiphenomalist philosopher, and Richard Marshall to discuss the nature of human  experience. With live music from Adam Paul Leach. First broadcast on 18 October 2011 on Resonance FM.
itunes:summary: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now visits the realm of the senses with guests Barry Smith, Director of the Institute of Philosophy, Norman Bacrac, an epiphenomalist philosopher, and Richard Marshall to discuss the nature of human  experience.
